parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Feminine of apparently a primary word; 'green'; Chloe, a Christian female.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To show, make clear, reveal. From delos; to make plain.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Contention, strife, wrangling. Of uncertain affinity; a quarrel, i.e. wrangling.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
